page.title: 08Church & School in Hellesdon
page.content: Arden Grove has been open 10 years and has approximately 146 pupils and 5 classes.The catchment area for pupils is Reepham road on one side and part of Middletons lane.The head teacher is Mrs.A.King. Firside was opened in 1939 as a Secondary Modern school,later it was changed into a Middle school.It has about 270 pupils and 10 classes.The head teacher is Mr.Holmes. St.Pauls church is in Hawthorn Avenue, it has family communion,family service Scout and Guide parades and Baptisms each 2nd Sunday,every month.The vicar is Reverand Hoare. St Margarets church has a sundial over the door,it is quite old.The tower is the shape of a hexagon.The vicar is Mr.N.B.Mash. Hellesdon Christian Fellowship meets at Meadow way chapel.Mr.Southgate runs it.
